review_text: Groww charts are very basic and the team is not releasing any updates at all. No features like a traders diary, multiple watchlists, order tabs are creating confusion. Events calendar don't have any alert option. No notes to the watchlist. The customer support is very delayed and no one is interested in taking the feedback as well. no updates to groww charts from 3.5 months, groww team is not responding on this at all. Your what's new section writings contain more creativity than your platforms.

it's a great app, easy to use, but update that we have two options long term stock and short term stock to check portfolio and not to maintain account with different brokers. please look into this update. if this happens it's more beneficial.
I have naked option bought and later I want to convert it to bull call strategy. The margin required get very high. Why? Bring safe exit commodity FnO.

taking so much charges in every trade...still so much glitches are there...sometimes you won't able to see your holding postions...charts are so much pathetic...you cannot able to zoom out the chart properly for analysing...please fix this all then take so much charges.. I will just use it for 2-3 months more if there is no changes or improvement I will shift to another app..if you can't improve your app, you should take low charges..

worst app.too much glitch/error/scam. to buy any kind of equity or commodity it doesn't take even milliseconds but when I wanted to sell my order at set target the order wasn't executed even though commodity price crossed the set target and worst customer support service ever, it took more than 30 min to reply on my query.. better use some other app..

I have been using Groww app since 2021, when I first started my investing journey. This app is pretty much user friendly for anyone new to the investment tools like stocks, MF, ETF etc. and also for quick disbursal loans. I am very happy with the kind of services offered and the regular app updates which makes it even better.

Provide option to see p&l on weekly basis just like it has quarterly ,last30 days option under p&l report ..this will help to track p&l record on weekly basis and save times right now we have to put custome date to see weekly performance

A new feature suggestion: after taking trade in scalping mode. we get disturbed when we see price fluctuations in pnl. so a instant hide or show pnl would be best to control mind( like show password or hide type option). please consider it. there is a space on right side of strike price and index selection option in Scalper mode where switch option was there in beginning. it is a humble request.

I am not sure why, but Groww’s customer support executives are extremely unresponsive. They appear to be in a hurry to close the chat and often end the conversation on their own without confirming whether the issue has been resolved. After the first query is submitted, there is no opportunity to ask follow-up questions or seek clarification on the solution they provide. Whether the response is understood or helpful seems irrelevant, as the chat is abruptly closed.

Groww is an excellent app for investing and trading especially in options. The interface is user-friendly... The app allows to view and trade in equities, options and commodities on a single platform. Many of the previous glitches have been resolved and overall performance has improved significantly. The technical support team is responsive and making the trading experience smooth and nice...

the worst app for trading taking almost 16+ days for verification of your account you will be unable to buy or sell stocks if your NSE account is not activated and if you ask them for help they just say tomorrow it will be activated there tomorrow never comes.. I called multiple times but no solution for the problem

Dear Groww Support Team, I am using the Groww app, and until now I have not faced any issues with buying or selling shares. However, I am currently facing a problem with withdrawing my funds. The withdrawal amount is not being transferred immediately, whereas when I use the “Add Money” option, the amount is transferred to the Groww app instantly. I kindly request you to look into this issue and resolve the problem of delayed withdrawal as soon as possible.

excellent app with excellent UI.... suggestion: please add the feature like trading view app that allows to switch the next stock without going back from the chart.... it is very useful in bulk stocks analysis... Thank you for amazing app.. hoping you will consider this suggestion...
The User Interface is Excellent Thanks for providing the XIRR feature, i request you to add features like the average holding period of all available stocks and mutual funds in my portfolio.

Very poor withdrawal experience. The money withdrawal option is pathetic and highly unreliable. There is no clear or committed TAT—payments are processed entirely at their own discretion. This causes unnecessary delays and inconvenience for customers. A financial app should be transparent and timely, which is clearly missing here.

On 30 Dec, Groww changed the default order type to Intraday without clear warning or explicit confirmation. This caused many users (including me) to place intraday trades unintentionally instead of delivery. I lost ₹5,000 due to this unsafe UX change. Changing financial defaults silently is a dark pattern that benefits higher intraday volumes. I have order history proof. Requesting refund or official acknowledgment and rollback of this default behavior.
